tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    dob DATE,
    address VARCHAR(100),
    medical_record_no VARCHAR(20),
    diagnosis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
  prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  prescription_date DATE NOT NULL,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dosage VARCHAR(20),
  frequency VARCHAR(20),
  instructions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Medical_Records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    treatment_plan TEXT,
    record_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    illness_description TEXT,
    treatment_plan TEXT,
    medical_professional VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    dob DATE NOT NULL,
    site_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES research_sites(site_id)
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
    prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    medication_id INT,
    prescribing_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, medication_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medications(medication_id)
);
